results.title: Impeachment Hearings: Live Updates of Marie Yovanovitch’s Testimony
results.abstract: As the former ambassador to Ukraine testified about her shock and disgust at discovering President Trump had denigrated her in a July call with the president of Ukraine, he insulted her on Twitter. She said the president’s words “sounded like a threat,” and that the tweets were “very intimidating.”
results.byline: By PETER BAKER and MICHAEL D. SHEAR
des_facet: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-Blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
